attributes.action: introduce a law requiring every sentence spoken within the United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland to begin with the following: 'In the immortal words of Duke Nukem...'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its exactly what it says, I want to improve the way we communicate, and recognise The Duke.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
